name: Complete Discovery Source Federal Cloud
short_description: CDS covers the complete eDiscovery process from forensics collections and early case assessment to review and production.
long_description: Successful eDiscovery outcomes require the right balance of tools, expertise, and vision. CDS covers the complete eDiscovery process from forensics collections and early case assessment to review and production.  CDS â€“ Federal Cloud Discovery Services (FCDS) performs a set of operations required to progress through the various phases of the discovery process, including Chain of Custody Tracking, Data Staging, Data Filtering, De-duplication, Metadata Extraction, Full Text Extraction, Exception Handling, Data Conversion, Document Review Management, Document Review, Redaction and Annotation, and Load File Production.
